name: Vote By-Elections
description: A by-election is an election that takes place in a ward in a municipality between general municipal elections which are held every five years

name: 2024 General Election
description: The 2024 South African general election will be held in 2024 to elect a new National Assembly as well as the provincial legislature in each province.
